entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the foothills this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
